participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, enjoys hands-on activities and has a passion for nature.
participant_1.background: I like to travel and I'm comfortable in my boots. My favorite movie is Pretty Woman. I grew up in the country, where there was plenty of land to grow sunflowers. I love my green tea set. I find it relaxing to create beautiful things with my hands.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: A dedicated family man with a humorous outlook on life, enjoys learning and staying active.
participant_2.background: I am a memory buff who loves to learn new things and keep my mind sharp. I love bananas because they're sweet and portable. I have twelve kids. I almost shot a tourist while playing with my gun. I made a lot of changes to my diet and exercise habits and I'm proud of my progress.

content.text: It's going well!  How about yourself?
Good thanks. Just got back from the country. I miss the fresh air.
I love the country too.  I have a farm where I raise my kids.
Wow, that's a lot of kids!  How do you manage?
It can be tough, but it's worth it.  They keep me young.
I bet they do.  What's your favorite thing to do with them?
We love to go camping and explore the outdoors.
That sounds like a lot of fun.  I love to travel.  Where's your favorite place to go?
I love going to the beach.  I love the sand and the ocean.
The ocean is great.  I love swimming and fishing.
Me too!  We should go camping together sometime.
That would be fun!  I'd love to meet your kids.
Sure!  We could go this weekend if you're free.
